page.title: Privacy Policy
page.intro: Agenda Souterrain is a collaborative calendar service. We are committed to protecting your personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
page.controllerText: The data controller is the operator of the Agenda Souterrain service. For any questions regarding your data, please contact us at the address provided at the bottom of this page.
page.dataAccount: Account data: email address, name, password (stored in hashed form).
page.dataCalendar: Calendar data: events, sub-calendars, comments, attached files.
page.dataTechnical: Technical data: IP address (in server logs), browser user agent.
page.purposeEmail: Sending email notifications (invitations, verification, password reset).
page.legalBasisText: The processing of your data is based on the performance of a contract (Article 6.1.b of the GDPR) for the provision of the service, and on your consent (Article 6.1.a) for optional cookies.
page.retentionText: Your data is retained as long as your account is active. You may request the deletion of your account and all associated data at any time.
page.sharingText: Your data is never sold to third parties. It is hosted and processed by the following sub-processors:
page.transfersText: Some of our sub-processors (Cloudflare, Render) are based in the United States. Transfers are governed by standard contractual clauses compliant with the GDPR.
page.rightsText: Under the GDPR, you have the following rights:
page.rightAccess: Right of access to your personal data
page.rightRectification: Right to rectification of inaccurate data
page.rightDeletion: Right to erasure (right to be forgotten)
page.contactText: To exercise your rights or for any questions regarding your personal data, please contact us by email.
page.changesText: This privacy policy may be updated. The date of the last modification is indicated at the top of this page.
